commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What do you mean?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Hold on. Let me check my messages.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Umm. It looks like there are a bunch of reasons.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The biggest one being that they couldn't get permission to use the venue they planned to for the festival, apparently.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The Festival Committee said they were negotiating the whole time and also looking for another venue, but it didn't work out in the end.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! That's terrible!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Kasumi, calm down. It's weird that they've always used the same venue, but suddenly they can't.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yeah, it is. Why couldn't they get permission to use it?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Maybe there's an even bigger event going on?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But the School Idol Festival is an on-going, yearly, super big event!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes. school idols and their fans across the country were looking forward to it.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It's so sad the whole thing gets canceled just because they couldn't book that venue.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We were going to be on the main stage! Does this mean that's all over?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We even wrote a whole new song for it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm not going to accept this, even if they say it's canceled.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh. That was the final bell for school.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sitting around won't do us any good, so let's just all go home and look into this some more.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I'd be devastated if the School Idol Festival is canceled. And just when I made a song I wanted everyone to sing.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I want to see everyone get on the stage and be on the same level as μ's and Aqours. I'm not going to give up!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, where has the School Idol Festival been held up to now?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Here it is. I need to see what event is being held instead. Wait, it's being renovated?! Why?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No way. It's being renovated for the Olympics. I guess there's nothing we can do, then.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then what about a different venue of about the same size, with easy access?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Sigh* (Even reducing the size of the venue and disregarding the ease of access, all venues are being used for other corporate events.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If one place is being used for the Olympics, then it won't be free to use until after the Olympics are over.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then what's going to happen to the festival? Is it going to be canceled the whole time?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, did you figure anything out yet?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Did you find a solution to our problem?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The reason they can't use the venue for the festival is because it's being renovated for the Olympics.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The Olympics...?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: They're going to use it as one of the venues for the Olympics, huh?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: In that case, there's not much we can do, huh?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I see. So that's why negotiations failed.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We can't do it at any other venue?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Y-Yeah, what Rina said.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Just like the message we got from the Committee yesterday, they did try looking for other venues.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But, because this huge venue is being used for the Olympics, all the other small places are booked up for business events.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: So we're just blocked in every direction?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I understand we can't do anything about it, but this doesn't sit right with me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah! The entire country's school idols and all their fans were really looking forward to this event!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I wanted to sing the song you wrote for us.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: This is frustrating. I thought we'd be on stage with μ's and Aqours.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah... We still have some time, so I want to try to think of something.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yeah, I mean you went through all that trouble of writing that song.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Actually, I have a favor to ask you guys. Setsuna, can we put on a show in the Nijigasaki auditorium?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want everyone to see you guys sing the song I wrote for you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If you can, invite μ's and Aqours. I was able to write that song thanks to their advice. They all gave me a lot of inspiration and passion.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, I want to see you all sing it, and I want μ's and Aqours to hear it. So let's have a live show in the auditorium!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'd love to!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Me too!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Us too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: How about it, Setsuna?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I feel the same as everyone else!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I think we can get permission to use it. There might be a few overlaps with other clubs, but we should be okay.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: All right! We're counting on you, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks Setsuna! I wanted μ's and Aqours to hear the song at the festival, though.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It doesn't matter where it is. We'll have μ's, Aqours, and everyone listen to that song you wrote just for us.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, you're right!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Now that that's decided, let's get to practice!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Gotta think up the choreography!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Rina, can I talk to you about some costume design?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Of course.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, I have a favor to ask of all of you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I wrote this song thinking about all of you and how I feel about you. I know it's selfish, but the first time this song is sung, I want it to be sung--

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: By everyone!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I know we first decided for Nijigasaki to go solo.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But we wanted to express our thanks to you for being so amazing by singing the song together.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Right, guys?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: We want you to see us sing it all together!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: E-Everyone...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I mean, this a song just for school idols by one of their biggest fans!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Okay, let's do our best in practice everyone!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
